verses.verse: And Saul <S%H7586><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> that they should kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

But Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> delighted <S%H2654><s%> much <S%H3966><s%> in David: <S%H1732><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> thee: now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> take heed to thyself <S%H8104><s%> until the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and abide <S%H3427><s%> in a secret <S%H5643><s%> place, and hide thyself: <S%H2244><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> will go out <S%H3318><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H3027><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art, and I <S%H589><s%> will commune <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H413><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> of thee; and what <S%H4100><s%> I see, <S%H7200><s%> that I will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee.

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Let not <S%H408><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against his servant, <S%H5650><s%> against David; <S%H1732><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath not <S%H3808><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee, and because <S%H3588><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> have been to thee-ward very <S%H3966><s%> good: <S%H2896><s%>

For he did put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%> in his hand, <S%H3709><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Philistine, <S%H6430><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> thou sawest <S%H7200><s%> it, and didst rejoice: <S%H8055><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then wilt thou sin <S%H2398><s%> against innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> without a cause? <S%H2600><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jonathan: <S%H3083><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> swore, <S%H7650><s%> As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> he shall not <S%H518><s%> be slain. <S%H4191><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> showed <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and he was <S%H1961><s%> in his presence, <S%H6440><s%> as in times past. <S%H8032><s%> <S%H865><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> again: <S%H3254><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter; <S%H4347><s%> and they fled <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.

And the evil <S%H7451><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> as he <S%H1931><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%> with his javelin <S%H2595><s%> in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> played <S%H5059><s%> with his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to smite <S%H5221><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> even to the wall <S%H7023><s%> with the javelin; <S%H2595><s%> but he slipped away <S%H6362><s%> out of Saul's presence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7586><s%> and he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the javelin <S%H2595><s%> into the wall: <S%H7023><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and escaped <S%H4422><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> to watch <S%H8104><s%> him, and to slay <S%H4191><s%> him in the morning: <S%H1242><s%> and Michal <S%H4324><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou save <S%H4422><s%> not <S%H369><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%> tonight, <S%H3915><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> shalt be slain. <S%H4191><s%>

So Michal <S%H4324><s%> let David down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732><s%> through <S%H1157><s%> a window: <S%H2474><s%> and he went, <S%H1980><s%> and fled, <S%H1272><s%> and escaped. <S%H4422><s%>

And Michal <S%H4324><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> an image, <S%H8655><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it in <S%H413><s%> the bed, <S%H4296><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a pillow <S%H3523><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair for his bolster, <S%H4763><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> it with a cloth. <S%H899><s%>
And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> He <S%H1931><s%> is sick. <S%H2470><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> again to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring him up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me in the bed, <S%H4296><s%> that I may slay <S%H4191><s%> him.

And when the messengers <S%H4397><s%> were come in, <S%H935><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was an image <S%H8655><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the bed, <S%H4296><s%> with a pillow <S%H3523><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair for his bolster. <S%H4763><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Michal, <S%H4324><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> hast thou deceived <S%H7411><s%> me so, <S%H3602><s%> and sent away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine enemy, <S%H341><s%> that he is escaped? <S%H4422><s%> And Michal <S%H4324><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> He <S%H1931><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Let me go; <S%H7971><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> should I kill <S%H4191><s%> thee?

So David <S%H1732><s%> fled, <S%H1272><s%> and escaped, <S%H4422><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> to Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to him. And he <S%H1931><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Naioth. <S%H5121><s%>
And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> is at Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> David: <S%H1732><s%> and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the company <S%H3862><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesying, <S%H5012><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> as appointed <S%H5324><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> prophesied. <S%H5012><s%>

And when it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> other <S%H312><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> likewise. <S%H1571><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> time, and they <S%H1992><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

Then went <S%H1980><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> well <S%H953><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in Sechu: <S%H7906><s%> and he asked <S%H7592><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Where <S%H375><s%> are Samuel <S%H8050><s%> and David? <S%H1732><s%> And one said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> they be at Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%>

And he went <S%H1980><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah: <S%H7414><s%> and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him <S%H1931><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and he went on, <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> and prophesied, <S%H5012><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to Naioth <S%H5121><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> stripped off <S%H6584><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and prophesied <S%H5012><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in like manner, <S%H1571><s%> and lay down <S%H5307><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that night. <S%H3915><s%> Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> among the prophets? <S%H5030><s%>
